pageProduct.name: Sukin Botanical Body Wash Pineapple & Coconut 500ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

A Coconut & Pineapple Aroma Delights The Senses, Jojoba, Avocado & Rosehip Leave Skin Clean And Hydrated.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. We Recommend Patch Testing. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

Our Soap-Free Coconut?& Pineapple Body Wash Delights And Stimulates The?Senses?While?Leaving?Skin Clean And?Fresh. Jojoba,?Avocado?And?Rosehip?Oils?Are?Combined?To?Purify, Hydrate And?Soften?The Skin?While?Cleansing.?With?Calming Aloe Vera, Skin?Is?Left?Feeling?Soothed?And?Lightly?Hydrated.??

Ingredients

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Peg-150 Pentaerythrityl Tetrastearate, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract (Chamomile), Yucca Schidigera Root Extract, Lavandula Angustifolia Flower Extract (Lavender), Rosa Canina Fruit Oil (Rosehip), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Fragrance (Parfum)*.*Natural Fragrance

Directions

Application:  Use A Small Amount On A Sponge In The Shower Or Bath. Lather And Rinse Thoroughly.
